meanings.sent1: The huso swam gracefully in the deep waters.
meanings.sent2: I saw a huso at the aquarium, it was huge!
meanings.sent3: The huso fish decided to throw a party in the river.
meanings.sent4: The huso moved through the water like a majestic ruler.
meanings.sent5: The huso's size and beauty left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.sent1: The huso genus includes some of the largest fish in the world.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the huso to learn more about its habitat.
meanings.sent3: The huso fish from different genera had a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fish, the huso stands out like a king among commoners.
meanings.sent5: The huso genus represents a fascinating group of aquatic creatures.

meanings.definition: The female reproductive organ of a flower.
meanings.sent1: The huso of the flower plays a crucial role in pollination.
meanings.sent2: Bees are attracted to the sweet scent of the huso.
meanings.sent3: The huso blushed when the bee complimented its beauty.
meanings.sent4: The huso of the flower whispered secrets to the passing breeze.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the huso attract many pollinators.
